trans-unit.source: Defines the condition definition behind a <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Define a definição da condição por trás de um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionReference"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The RuleExpressionCondition class defines the base conditions evaluated when a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet> is executed.
trans-unit.target: A classe RuleExpressionCondition define a base de condições avaliada quando um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>é executado.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet>

trans-unit.source: This condition type is modeled with CodeDom types.
trans-unit.target: Esse tipo de condição é modelado com tipos de CodeDom.

trans-unit.source: For more information about CodeDom types, see [CodeDOM Types Supported by Windows Workflow Foundation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0381740f-0a29-43ae-96e2-17e14e832083).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre tipos de CodeDom, consulte [CodeDOM tipos com suporte pelo Windows Workflow Foundation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/0381740f-0a29-43ae-96e2-17e14e832083).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> class by using a specified code expression.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> classe usando uma expressão de código especificada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> para inicializar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> com.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> class by using a specified name.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> classe usando um nome especificado.

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O nome da condição para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: conditionName is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: conditionNameé uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> class by using a specified name and code expression.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> classe usando uma expressão de nome e o código especificada.

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O nome da condição para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> to initialize the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> with.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref> para inicializar o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> com.

trans-unit.source: Creates a deep copy of the current <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Cria uma cópia profunda da atual <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> that is identical to this instance.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> que é idêntica a esta instância.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two object instances are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de objeto são iguais.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> to compare with the current object.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>para comparar com o objeto atual.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object instances are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se as instâncias de objeto forem iguais; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Evaluates the expression.
trans-unit.target: Avalia a expressão.

trans-unit.source: Instance of the runtime context that <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref> is running in.
trans-unit.target: Instância do contexto de tempo de execução que <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref> está em execução no.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression evaluates to true; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a expressão for avaliada como true; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a condição de expressão para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: The expression condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: A condição de expressão para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: The activity running the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is runtime initialized.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que executa o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref> é inicializado de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Gets the dependencies for the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as dependências para o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerenciar o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: A list of dependencies.
trans-unit.target: Uma lista de dependências.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: The hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: O código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome da condição para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: The name of the condition to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: O nome da condição para avaliar.

trans-unit.source: The activity running the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"></xref> is runtime initialized.
trans-unit.target: A atividade que executa o <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleSet"> </xref> é inicializado de tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: Called when all properties have been given values.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando todas as propriedades receberam valores.

trans-unit.source: After this call, no properties can be modified.
trans-unit.target: Após essa chamada, não há propriedades podem ser modificadas.

trans-unit.source: Returns the string value of the expression condition.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o valor de cadeia de caracteres da condição de expressão.

trans-unit.source: The string value of the expression condition.
trans-unit.target: O valor de cadeia de caracteres da condição de expressão.

trans-unit.source: An empty string if the expression condition is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres vazia se a condição de expressão for <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Verifies that the expression is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: Verifica se a expressão está configurada corretamente e não tem erros.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition> contains errors (the `Validate` method returns `false`), then <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> will contain the list of errors encountered.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>contém erros (o `Validate` método retorna `false`), em seguida, <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName>conterá a lista de erros encontrados.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation.Errors%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleExpressionCondition>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"></xref> to manage the validation process.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleValidation"> </xref> para gerenciar o processo de validação.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the expression has no errors; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se a expressão não tem erros; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: validator is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: validatoré uma referência nula ( no Visual Basic).
